statements: DELETE FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-10' AND employee_id = 102;
DELETE FROM attendance WHERE check_in < '2022-01-01' OR employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT');
DELETE FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 67890 AND work_date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'Marketing';
DELETE FROM work_hours WHERE work_date = '2022-01-15' OR employee_id = 105;
DELETE FROM Leave WHERE start_date = '2022-08-10' AND end_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM WorkHours WHERE employee_id = 202 AND work_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM WorkHours WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
